name: DuckDuckGo Pro
description: Another duckduckgo theme. Light, dark, flat. Make DuckDuckGo your own! You can now customize the background of your favorite search engine :) Try out yourself with this background tile! Based on MinimalDuckGo (compatible with DarkDuckGo). Theme by n0x (nox).
additional_info: -- Get more userstyles from me! -- - Also take a look at my friend's DuckDuckGo style! - Please report bugs and/or make new features suggestions! 10/07/2015 RELEASE: First upload. Based on MinimalDuckGo. Enjoy!
